bill.title: Wild hogs; authorize to be hunted year-round with proper permit or license.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 49-7-31.5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The Year-round Hunting Of Wild Hogs; To Require Those Persons Hunting Wild Hogs Possesses A Permit, All-game Hunting License Or Trapping License, Unless Otherwise Exempt; To Require Persons Hunting Or Trapping Wild Hogs To Purchase A Minimum Of Twenty-five Tags From The Department Of Wildlife, Fisheries And Parks, To Be Issued Annually At The Time Of The Purchase Of The Required Permit Or Appropriate License; To Authorize The Department To Establish Rules And Regulation To Regulate The Hunting Of Wild Hogs; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Wildlife, Fisheries and Parks
